commands.description: Update the threads manually by adding missing users
commands.error: This command can only be used in or for a thread.

help.all: - `/update all`: to add on all threads of the guild.
help.desc: Update the threads manually with adding missing users, using these commands:
help.description: Show the help of the command
help.name: help
help.thread: - `/update thread <thread>`: to update a specific thread (select it from the list). If no channel is selected, uses the current channel.
help.title: Manual commands help

commands.name: update

updateAllThreads.description: Update all threads with adding missing users
updateAllThreads.name: all

updateSpecificThread.description: Update a specific thread with adding missing users

channel.name: On channel, forum or category update
channel.title: Channel, category, forum

main.description: Edit the server configuration. Allow to disable / enable some events
main.name: config

channel.desc: Channel where to send the logs
channel.error: You can't use this channel to send the logs.
channel.success: The logs channel is now {{- channel}}.
channel.title: log

log.desc: Choose the channel to send the logs

message.description: Message sent by the bot as a placeholder to avoid ghost pings.
message.name: placeholder

option.description: Content of the message sent. Does not support emojis from other servers!
option.name: message

response.custom: The message `{{- message}}` will be sent as a placeholder.

pin.description: Pin the message send by the bot in the thread
pin.name: pin

response.disabled:
Messages will not be pinned. The bot will try to find the previously sent message to use it, or will send a new one if it cannot find it.

:warning: **Although the message may seem easy to find, Discord caches messages and only allows a certain number of messages to be retrieved. This makes it difficult to find in some cases.**
response.enabled:
The message sent by the bot in the threads will be pinned, which will prevent the bot from always finding it and thus avoid any pings.

:warning: **Although pinning the message makes it easier to find, it does not guarantee that it will be found. It is therefore still (unfortunately) possible that the bot will send a message to add members.**

menu.description:
The bot can be activated on:
- Changing the permission of a member, a channel, a category or forum
- When a thread is created,
- When a new member arrives.

You can also disable all update, and follow only some channel or roles.

 The configuration commands are:

error.deletedBotMessage: The message *placeholder* from <@{{- bot}}> was deleted in {{- thread}}.
error.failedReply: Error: Unable to send the reply. Please try again or check your permissions.
error.missingPermission: Knitting doesn't have the permissions to write in <#{{- thread}}>.

follow.description: Update only on the followed role/channels

error.conflictTracked: {{- item}} is already ignored. Remove it from ignored before following it.
error.followChannel:
This command can only be used when **Channel only** mode is activated.
To stop following certain channels, please use the command </ignore channel:{{- id}}>.
error.role:
This command can only be used when **role only** mode is enabled.
To stop tracking certain roles, please use the command </ignore role:{{- id}}>.

list.description: Display the followed channels or roles
list.title: Follow

roleIn.description: Follow a role for a channel

thread.description: Manage the following of channel, threads, categories, or forums
thread.descriptionWithRole: Manage the followed channel, threads, categories, or forums for {{- role}}.

follow.title: follow

error.conflictTracked: {{- item}} is already followed. Remove it from followed before ignoring it.
error.followChannel:
This command cannot be activated when **Channel only** mode is enabled.
To stop following certain channels, please use the </follow channel:{{- id}}> command.
error.followRole:
This command cannot be activated when **role only** mode is enabled.
To stop following certain roles, please use the </follow role:{{- id}}> command.
error.followRoleIn:
This command cannot be activated when the **[@role] mode in [#channel]** is enabled.
To stop following certain channels or roles, please use the </follow specific:{{- id}}> command.

list.description: List all ignored channels, threads, categories and role
list.title: List of ignored channels, categories, threads and roles

roleIn.description: Ignore a channel for a specific role
roleIn.title: Roles ignored in specifics channels

thread.description: Manage ignored threads, channel, forums or categories
thread.descriptionWithRole: Manage ignored threads, channels, forums or categories for {{- role}}.

info.cmds: Get some information about the bot
info.desc: A little Discord bot written in TypeScript that automatically add / remove member in thread, without pinging them!
info.title: Information

channelUpdate.category: Updated {{- nb}} threads accross {{- nbChan}} channels:

updated.noRole: {{- user}} has been updated but no roles were added.
updated.roleList: {{- user}} has been updated with roles: {{- role}}

thread.join_error:
The bot can't join <#{{- id}}>:
```
{{- error}}
```

error.need: You must first activate the "follow [@role] in [#channel]" mode.
error.otherMode: You can't use this command with the other follow-only mode.

noLonger.any: The role {{- mention}} is no longer {{- on}} in any channel.

roleIn.updated: The role {{- mention}} will be {{- on}} in:{{- channels}}
